text.div:
EntityClassPlace

A physicial place or site with its containing structure. May be natural or man-made. The geographic position of a place may or may not be constant.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/EntityClass where concept is-a PLC

name: EntityClassPlace
description: A physicial place or site with its containing structure. May be natural or man-made.  The geographic position of a place may or may not be constant.
